game.name: Bonnie Surprise Proposal
game.description:
Ken is in love badly with Bonnie and for this reason he has made out a surprise proposal for his beloved girlfriend. He has approached Anna for help, but could not get the right advice. So he has now approached you to know the ring size of her love. Would you like to help him out to impress her love? Join Bonnies Surprise Proposal game and be prepared to make sure that his proposal is perfect! After measuring her ring size, you also have to help both pick up the nice wedding outfits. 

Roll up your sleeves and begin making a plan to organize a perfect proposal together in this brand new girls game! First of all, rush towards the home of Bonnie to figure out her ring size when she sleeps. Open her drawer, spot a measuring tap and get ready to measure ring finger without her knowing! After measuring the size of ring, make sure to challenge your jewelry designing abilities to prepare a statement piece of ring with the help of your favorite gold color, delicate decorations and precious stones. 

Your job does not end here. But, you also have to take care of the wedding outfits for the gorgeous bride and handsome groom. Dress her up with a white color with some nice flairs and complete her look with a beautiful tiara, and a pair of matching sandals in this one of the best dressing games for girls! Ken is also waiting his turn. Give him a nice suit with a matching shirt, tie and a pair of shoes! Put your fashion skills to the test to create the jaw-dropping results in this wedding game! We hope that your fine efforts will help them to live happily ever after.
